titles.title: Conservation Cost-Share Act of 1988
A bill to amend the Food Security Act of 1985 to adjust the Federal cost-share to encourage the entry of windbreaks and shelterbelts into the conservation reserve program, and for other purposes.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Agriculture.
Referred to Subcommittee on Conservation and Forestry.

bill.summary: 5/26/1988--Introduced. Conservation Cost-Share Act of 1988 - Amends the Food Security Act of 1985 to revise conservation reserve program (program) cost-sharing formulas for: (1) specified tree plantings (of up to 20 rows) in areas of limited rainfall; and (2) grass seeding in areas where such costs exceed program rental payments.
